edu.washington.ext

Class InvoiceItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem

  • public class InvoiceItem
extends java.lang.Object
    InvoiceItem Represents an item on an invoice. The InvoiceItem is immutable.
    Author:
    christurner
